results.name: a(n) = n*(n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3)/3.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Diego Marques, The order of appearance of the product of consecutive Lucas numbers, Fibonacci Quarterly, 51 (2013), 38-43. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 06 2013
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
mathematica: Table[n*(n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3)/3, {n,0,40}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 21 2009, modified by _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 27 2019 *)
